amendment.description: Amendment makes technical and clarifying changes to the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 109-179 to make a number of technical and clarifying changes to the bill H.R. 3070.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boehlert amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Boehlert.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boehlert amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
